name: Uxie
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

poke_power.name: Set Up
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Uxie from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic Restore
attacks.effect: You may put Uxie and all cards attached to it on the bottom of your deck in any order.
